roleset.name: move backwards, return to a previous state

role.descr: thing moving, going back to previous state

example.name: Humanity retrogressing
example.text: Humanity will retrogress as people's thoughts and behaviours become increasingly ridiculous.
example.arg: as people's thoughts and behaviours become increasingly ridiculous

example.name: All arguments
example.text: John retrogressed from the maturity of a house cat to that of a flea.
example.arg: from the maturity of a house cat

predicate.note: Frames file for 'retrogress' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'progress.'
